description:
Active@ Disk Editor - advanced disk data inspector

Active@ Disk Editor is an advanced tool for viewing and editing of raw data (sectors) on physical hard disks. Inspect file structures and edit data directly in volumes, partitions and files with integrated support of MBR, GPT, NTFS, FAT, exFAT, HFS+, ext2, ext3, ext4, UFS and LDM structures.
